info.title: Kuchi Backend API
info.description: API documentation for Kuchi Backend with JWT Authentication

get.summary: Get all About Us (Public)

content.example: This is about our company history and mission...

get.summary: Get single about us entry by ID (Public)

post.summary: Create new about us entry (Admin only)

content.example: This is about our company history and mission...

get.summary: Get latest active about us entry (Public)

404.description: No active about us entry found

get.summary: Get all home banners (Public - No authentication required)

post.summary: Create a new home banner (Admin only)

get.summary: Get a specific home banner (Public - No authentication required)

post.summary: Login user and auto-save device metadata
Logout user and update mata data

get.summary: Get authenticated user
Get all users with pagination (Admin and Sales can access)
Search users by name or email
Get user by ID
Get all events (Public - No authentication required)

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description: Filter by event type based on start time

videos.description: JSON string of videos. Example: [{title: Intro, url: https://youtu.be/abc}]

get.summary: Get event by ID (Public - No authentication required)

videos.description: JSON string of videos. Example: [{title: Intro, url: https://youtu.be/abc}]

get.summary: Get all mata data with user information
Get specific mata data by ID
Get all mata data for a specific user

200.description: List of mata data for the user

get.summary: Get all active sessions (users who haven't logged out)
Get all Privacy Policy (Public)

content.example: This privacy policy describes how we handle your data...

get.summary: Get single privacy policy by ID (Public)

content.example: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data...

get.summary: Get latest active privacy policy (Public)
Get all stone groups with pagination (Admin only)

post.summary: Create a new stone group (Admin only)

get.summary: Get stone group by ID (Admin only)
Search stone groups by keyword (Admin only)

post.summary: Bulk upload stone groups from Excel file (Admin only)

file.description: Excel file (.xlsx, .xls, .csv) with columns: stonegroup_GUID, stonegroup_name, stonegroup_shortname, is_disabled

get.summary: Get all terms and conditions (Public)
Get single terms and conditions by ID (Public)

post.summary: Create new terms and conditions (Admin only)

content.example: These terms and conditions govern your use of our website...
